user.title: Frigate Config Builder
user.description: Configure where to save the generated Frigate configuration.

data_description.output_path: Path to save the generated frigate.yml file (e.g., /config/www/frigate.yml)
data_description.frigate_url: Frigate API URL for pushing config (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:5000). Leave empty to only save locally.
data_description.auto_push: Automatically push config and restart Frigate after generation

hardware.title: Hardware Configuration
hardware.description: Configure your object detector and hardware acceleration settings.

data_description.detector_type: Type of object detector (edgetpu for Coral, cpu for software)

mqtt.title: MQTT Configuration
mqtt.description:
Configure MQTT broker connection.

Home Assistant MQTT detected: **{mqtt_detected}**

data_description.mqtt_auto: Automatically use MQTT settings from Home Assistant
data_description.mqtt_host: MQTT broker hostname or IP (required if not using auto)

features.title: Feature Configuration
features.description: Enable Frigate features. These require additional hardware resources.

data_description.audio_detection: Detect audio events like barks, screams, and alarms
data_description.birdseye_mode: When to show cameras in BirdsEye view

retention.title: Retention Settings
retention.description: Configure how long to keep recordings and snapshots.

data_description.retain_alerts: Days to keep recordings containing alerts
data_description.retain_detections: Days to keep recordings containing detections
data_description.retain_motion: Days to keep recordings containing motion

error.invalid_path: Invalid output path. Must end with .yml
error.invalid_url: Invalid URL format. Must start with http:// or https://

abort.already_configured: Frigate Config Builder is already configured

data_description.selected_cameras: Select which cameras to include in the Frigate configuration
data_description.exclude_unavailable: When enabled, cameras that are currently offline or disconnected won't appear in the list
data_description.auto_groups_from_areas: Automatically create Frigate camera groups based on Home Assistant areas

generate.name: Generate Frigate Config
generate.description: Generate the Frigate configuration file from discovered cameras.

push.name: Push to Frigate
push.description: Push the configuration to Frigate API and restart.
